private/v27ter_tx.h

00027 
00028 #if !defined(_SPANDSP_PRIVATE_V27TER_TX_H_)
00029 #define _SPANDSP_PRIVATE_V27TER_TX_H_
00030 
00031 /*! The number of taps in the pulse shaping/bandpass filter */
00032 #define V27TER_TX_FILTER_STEPS      9
00033 
00034 /*!
00035     V.27ter modem transmit side descriptor. This defines the working state for a
00036     single instance of a V.27ter modem transmitter.
00037 */
00038 struct v27ter_tx_state_s
00039 {
00040     /*! \brief The bit rate of the modem. Valid values are 2400 and 4800. */
00041     int bit_rate;
00042     /*! \brief The callback function used to get the next bit to be transmitted. */
00043     get_bit_func_t get_bit;
00044     /*! \brief A user specified opaque pointer passed to the get_bit function. */
00045     void *get_bit_user_data;
00046 
00047     /*! \brief The callback function used to report modem status changes. */
00048     modem_tx_status_func_t status_handler;
00049     /*! \brief A user specified opaque pointer passed to the status function. */
00050     void *status_user_data;
00051 
00052 #if defined(SPANDSP_USE_FIXED_POINT)
00053     /*! \brief The gain factor needed to achieve the specified output power at 2400bps. */
00054     int32_t gain_2400;
00055     /*! \brief The gain factor needed to achieve the specified output power at 4800bps. */
00056     int32_t gain_4800;
00057 #else
00058     /*! \brief The gain factor needed to achieve the specified output power at 2400bps. */
00059     float gain_2400;
00060     /*! \brief The gain factor needed to achieve the specified output power at 4800bps. */
00061     float gain_4800;
00062 #endif
00063     /*! \brief The route raised cosine (RRC) pulse shaping filter buffer. */
00064 #if defined(SPANDSP_USE_FIXED_POINT)
00065     complexi16_t rrc_filter[2*V27TER_TX_FILTER_STEPS];
00066 #else
00067     complexf_t rrc_filter[2*V27TER_TX_FILTER_STEPS];
00068 #endif
00069     /*! \brief Current offset into the RRC pulse shaping filter buffer. */
00070     int rrc_filter_step;
00071     
00072     /*! \brief The register for the training and data scrambler. */
00073     unsigned int scramble_reg;
00074     /*! \brief A counter for the number of consecutive bits of repeating pattern through
00075                the scrambler. */
00076     int scrambler_pattern_count;
00077     /*! \brief TRUE if transmitting the training sequence, or shutting down transmission.
00078                FALSE if transmitting user data. */
00079     int in_training;
00080     /*! \brief A counter used to track progress through sending the training sequence. */
00081     int training_step;
00082 
00083     /*! \brief The current phase of the carrier (i.e. the DDS parameter). */
00084     uint32_t carrier_phase;
00085     /*! \brief The update rate for the phase of the carrier (i.e. the DDS increment). */
00086     int32_t carrier_phase_rate;
00087     /*! \brief The current fractional phase of the baud timing. */
00088     int baud_phase;
00089     /*! \brief The code number for the current position in the constellation. */
00090     int constellation_state;
00091     /*! \brief The get_bit function in use at any instant. */
00092     get_bit_func_t current_get_bit;
00093     /*! \brief Error and flow logging control */
00094     logging_state_t logging;
00095 };
00096 
00097 #endif
00098 /*- End of file ------------------------------------------------------------*/
